function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Improved ventilation, use of masks, and respiratory hygiene practices","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced respiratory protection, vaccination, and use of air filtration systems","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improved indoor ventilation systems, use of air purifiers, and wearing appropriate respiratory protection","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement ventilation and air filtration systems to remove and dilute droplets in the indoor environment.","category":"Disinfection of air","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use alternative methods for cough droplet collection, such as real-time detection and measurement techniques.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research to understand the influence of age and gender on droplet generation and transmission risk.","category":"Research and development of cleaning methods tailored to specific virus structures and environmental conditions.","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Enhanced ventilation, use of face masks, and physical distancing","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced sanitation and disinfection, use of protective equipment, and proper waste management","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of air purification systems and regulation of indoor air quality","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Research to understand pathogen response to humidity and development of strategies to mitigate risk","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maintain optimal humidity levels to reduce airborne transmission","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct further research to understand the relationship between humidity and virus survival","category":"Research to understand pathogen response to humidity and development of strategies to mitigate risk","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitor and control indoor temperatures to complement humidity levels for virus control","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement measures to enhance immune defense mechanisms and mucociliary clearance in cool environments.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Research and development of cleaning methods tailored to specific virus structures and environmental conditions.","category":"Research and development of cleaning methods tailored to specific virus structures and environmental conditions.","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Application of engineering techniques combined with public health interventions for more effective disease control.","category":"Introduce \"multi-use\" / modular designs","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of engineered techniques such as dilution, filtration, and uvgi","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Address air distribution patterns and occupants’ thermal comfort, consider hybrid ventilation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consider using higher efficiency filters such as hepa, enzyme filters; address penetration of hepa filters by nosocomial infections","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of the filter surface to prevent particle adhesion","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular monitoring and testing of uvgi effectiveness on various pathogens","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Controlled humidity levels in indoor environments, especially in areas with uvgi systems","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure good room air mixing and even distribution of uv radiation; use reflective surfaces to increase effectiveness","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Maintain room relative humidity around 50% to maximize uvgi effectiveness","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use deep louver enclosures and guidelines for upper-room uvgi application; avoid direct eye or skin exposure to uvgi","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Control air stream velocities to ensure uvgi system effectiveness","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular cleaning and maintenance of pco unit, enhancement of germicidal effect through doping tio2 with ag ions","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Further research on pathogen inactivation by pco, development of secondary chemical species filtration systems","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Further investigation and testing of the desiccant rotor’s efficacy in purging airborne pathogens.","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct comprehensive research and testing to assess the impact of pci on human health and air quality.","category":"Research and development of cleaning methods tailored to specific virus structures and environmental conditions.","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Establish guidelines and standards for the use of essential oils in ventilation systems, including testing for safety and efficacy.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use alternative air cleaning methods","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Avoid use of essential oils or use in well-ventilated areas","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct research to establish ventilation guidelines","category":"Research and development of cleaning methods tailored to specific virus structures and environmental conditions.","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Utilize displacement ventilation to create a more controlled and directional airflow.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of air purifiers, increase in air change rate, and implementation of infection control measures","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement effective ventilation and filtration systems, and regular cleaning and disinfection of surfaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of personal protective equipment ppe and regular cleaning of breathing zone surfaces","category":"Use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enhanced ventilation and filtration, and cleaning protocols targeted at respiratory particle removal","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular surface cleaning and disinfection to reduce the presence of viable pathogens on surfaces","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strategic positioning of inlet and outlet vents to optimize airflow and reduce particle deposition","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of the most effective ventilation supply system for reducing cross-infection","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Consider alternative ventilation methods and air distribution to minimize the risk of cross-infection.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimize ventilation systems for different patient positions and consider the use of air curtains or barriers to contain exhalation jets.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Optimize the design and airflow direction of floor diffusers to minimize particle resuspension and improve air quality.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement additional measures such as physical distancing, masking, and hand hygiene to complement ventilation strategies.","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase ventilation rate, employ underfloor ventilation system, use high efficiency personalized ventilation","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Encourage use of personalized ventilation, ensure all occupants are protected, improve perceived air quality","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Utilize technology to monitor user position and clothing insulation, and adjust diffuser angle accordingly. also, regulate ambient air temperature.","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Investing in infrastructure projects, adopting digital construction technologies, diversifying projects","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"}]}
